title: Setting boundaries around family involvement
content:
Scenario: Setting boundaries around family involvement
    Given Jordan's father often visits unannounced at the group home
    And Jordan values the visits but wants more notice
    When Jordan expresses desire for planned visits
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan communicate boundaries
    And the interface provides simple language for boundary expression
    And the family_elohim communicates Jordan's preference to father
    And Jordan's father learns to respect Jordan's adult boundaries
    And Jordan's autonomy is supported through boundary maintenance
    And the relationship improves through mutual respect
